put.desc: Create or update an Azure Cosmos DB SQL container

params.name: createUpdateSqlContainerParameters
params.desc: The parameters to provide for the current SQL container.

202.desc: The SQL container create or update operation will complete asynchronously.

200.desc: The SQL container create or update operation was completed successfully.

put.desc: Create or update an Azure Cosmos DB SQL trigger

params.name: createUpdateSqlTriggerParameters
params.desc: The parameters to provide for the current SQL trigger.

202.desc: The SQL trigger create or update operation will complete asynchronously.

200.desc: The SQL trigger create or update operation was completed successfully.

get.desc: Lists the SQL databases under an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

200.desc: The SQL database properties were retrieved successfully.

get.desc: Lists the SQL trigger under an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

200.desc: The SQL trigger properties were retrieved successfully.

get.desc: Lists the SQL container under an existing Azure Cosmos DB database account.

put.desc: Create or update an Azure Cosmos DB SQL database

params.name: createUpdateSqlDatabaseParameters
params.desc: The parameters to provide for the current SQL database.
